name: (ALPHA) Dhmis: the fan game - REMASTERED!
description:
IMPORTANT: LEVEL 1-3 HAVE FLASHING LIGHTS Dhmis: the Fan Game - Remastered! It's a remaster from my first Godot Engine project using the features from the the new 3.4.2 Update. The game is a 2d platformer where your objective is to collect 5 coins hidden in the map and reach to the go, there's 4 levels to each episodes and a boss battle against Roy. NEW FEATURES! Since now i have a better experience with game development the game is now with new features (Note: Some of then will be added in the future and can probably be cancelled or removed) - Art Style, Music, Sounds, Level Design and Menus are revamped! - One Episode, 3 Levels: Now you have the triple of the challenge. - Choose your character: Now you can swap between Yellow Guy, Duck and Red Guy on the levels at any moment, this mechanic is necessary to beat some part of the levels since each one have a different speed and jump value.  - The funniest level ever!: 👀👀👀 - Easter Eggs!: Easter Eggs! - New enemies, mechanics and bosses! -  All it's Pixel Art!: No more digital drawings made in my phone, all of them are made using a Pixel Art editor. How to Play Left and Right Arrow = Move Up Arrow = Jump 1, 2, 3 = Swap Character Esc = Pause E = Shoot(Yellow Guy) Secret Key 1 = Debug Level Select Secret Key 2 = Debug Level Skip


My Youtube Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC926wiai77-ThcvJKkh0PuA/videos
